title: Ticket #168: "Secure by default" configuration on Windows
description: It would be nice if the onus was placed on the installer when configuring a secure pool and/or machine on Windows. This includes setting the pool password, configuring the credd host or client, restricting configuration access to only those who need it, and, finally, mirroring any of the security defaults defined in the default *nix install.
creator: burnett
